Package net.ontopia.topicmaps.nav2.taglibs.TMvalue

Value-producing tags, which extract information from the topic map and insert it into the execution context.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AssociatedTag INTERNAL: Value producing tag that finds all the topics associated with this the topics in the input collection, subject to some constraints.
AssociationsTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for finding all the associations of all the topics or association roles in a collection.
AssociationTypeLoopTag INTERNAL: Special Tag for iterating over a sorted collection of triples (Association Type, Association Role Type, Association), creating new content for each iteration.
ClassesOfTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for finding all the classes of all the objects in a collection.
ClassesTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for finding all topics that define classes, either in general, or of a specific kind of object.
FilterTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for taking an input collection and filtering it, passing only some of the elements on to its parent (could be a set tag or another filter element).
FulltextTag INTERNAL: Tag used for executing fulltext queries and producing ranked list of topic map objects.
IndicatorsTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for finding all the subject indicators (as LocatorIF objects) of all the topics in a collection.
InstancesTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for finding all the instances of all the objects in a collection.
LocatorTag INTERNAL: Value producing and value accepting tag of retrieving the locators of OccurrenceIF and VariantNameIF instances.
LookupTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for looking up objects by their subject address, subject indicator, source locator, or object id.
NamesTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for finding all the base names of all the topics in a collection.
NameTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for finding the most appropiate name for each of all the topics in a collection.
OccurrencesTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for finding all the occurrences of all the topics in a collection.
ReifiedTag INTERNAL: Finds the topic map objects which are reified by topics in the input collection.
ReifierTag INTERNAL: Finds the reifying topic of each topic map object in a collection.
RolesTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for finding all the association roles of all the topics and associations in a collection.
ScopeTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for finding all themes in the scope of all the objects in a collection.
SourceLocatorsTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for finding all the source locators (as LocatorIF objects) of all the topic map objects in a collection.
SplitterTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for creating a collection of strings (which are representing the first character of a TopicNameIF object) of all the objects in a collection of TopicNameIF objects.
SubclassesTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for finding all the subclasses of the topics in a collection.
SubjectAddressTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for finding the subject address (as LocatorIF objects) of all the topics in a collection.
SuperclassesTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for finding all the superclasses of the topics in a collection.
ThemesTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for finding all topics that are used as themes in scopes, either in general, or of a specific kind of topic map object.
TologQueryTag INTERNAL: TologQueryTag evalutes a tolog query and returns a collection of maps.
TopicMapReferencesTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for generating a collection of TopicMapReferenceIF objects containing information about topicmaps available to this application.
TopicsTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for finding all the topics of all the topic map objects (allowed instances are TopicMapIF, TopicIF, AssociationRoleIF, AssociationIF, TopicNameIF, VariantNameIF and OccurrenceIF) in a collection.
VariantsTag INTERNAL: Value Producing Tag for finding all variant names related to the objects in a collection (can be either objects of classes TopicNameIF, TopicIF or TopicMapIF).
 

Package net.ontopia.topicmaps.nav2.taglibs.TMvalue Description

Value-producing tags, which extract information from the topic map and insert it into the execution context.
